aircraft.value: Cobra Advanced - AC-4927-208 at Base Delta

defect_observed.value: Fuel nozzle blockage. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel Injection component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 21/04/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 22/04/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 23/04/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 27/04/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 28/04/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

a) Root Cause Analysis: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel Injection component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
